1.name: Investigation by Assigned Investigators
1.message: Preliminary inquiry should be in progress.

2.name: Arrest and Bail (Jamin) Proceedings
2.message: Check arrest / bail proceedings. Charge sheet filing limit approach.

3.name: Crime Investigation with Senior PI
3.message: Investigation continues under Senior PI supervision.

4.name: Report Submission to ACP
4.message: Submit progress report to ACP for review.

5.name: Finalization of Investigation
5.message: Finalize investigation and prepare charge sheet.

6.name: Court Verification
6.message: Present charge sheet for court verification.

7.name: Submission of Crime to Court
7.message: Formal submission to court for trial scheduling.

1.name: Investigation by Assigned Investigators
1.message: Preliminary inquiry check for major case.

2.name: Arrest and Bail (Jamin) Proceedings
2.message: Arrest / Bail limit check for major case.

3.name: Crime Investigation with Senior PI
3.message: Senior PI review due for major investigation.

6.name: Court Verification
6.message: Major case court verification of charge sheet.

7.name: Submission of Crime to Court
7.message: Submit to court (60 day limit) for major case.
